Bibliography

  • [nss672342] National Sample Survey Office (NSSO), Economic Characteristics of Unincorporated Non-agricultural Enterprises (Excludig Construction) in India (July 2010-June 2011), National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2013).
  • [nss67234key] National Sample Survey Office (NSSO), Key Results of Survey on Unincorporated Non-agricultural Enterprises (excluding Construction) in India, 2010-11 (July 2010-June 2011), National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2012).
  • [nss6810report559] National Sample Survey Organisation (NSSO), Participation of Women in Specified Activities along with Domestic Duties, NSS 68th round, July 2011-June 12, National Sample Survey Organisation, Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, Government of India, New Delhi (2014).
  • [nss6810] National Sample Survey Office, Employment and Unemployment Situation in India, July 2011 - June 2012, National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2014).
  • [nss6810key] National Sample Survey Office (NSSO), Key Indicators of Employment And Unemployment in India, 2011-12 (July 2011-June 2012), National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2013).
  • [nss681key] National Sample Survey Office (NSSO), Key Indicators of Household Consumer Expenditure in India, 2011-12 (July 2011-June 2012), National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2013).
  • [nss68consumption] National Sample Survey Organisation, Household consumption of various goods and services in India, 2011-12, National Sample Survey Organisation, Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, Government of India, New Delhi .
  • [nsso560] National Sample Survey Organisation, Nutritional intake in India, 2011-12, National Sample Survey Organisation, Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, Government of India, New Delhi (2014).
  • [nss6912] National Sample Survey Office (NSSO), Key indicators of drinking water, sanitation, hygiene and housing condition in India, (July 2012-December 2012), National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2013).
  • [nss69021] National Sample Survey Office (NSSO), Key Indicators of Urban Slums in India, (July 2012-December 2012), National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2013).
  • [nsspilot2002] National Sample Survey Office (NSSO), Results of a Pilot Survey on Suitability of Different Reference Periods for Measuring Household Consumption (January-June 2000), National Sample Survey Office, Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, Government of India (2002).
